name: Country Dance
description:
Grab your Wii Remote and get your dancin' boots on! The dance action never stops with 4 super-cool game modes! Challenge your friends in a dance-off to see who has the best moves.

Features

18 CMA Winners including Carrie Underwood, Miranda Lambert, Darius Rucker, Sugarland, Toby Keith, Tim McGraw, Brad Paisley, and Blake Shelton. 25+ Chart-Topping Hits!
